text:
Kiwi.com | Platform Engineer | ONSITE | Brno, Czech Republic

Kiwi.com is an online travel agency with groundbreaking Virtual Interlining technology and a focus on exceptional customer service. Our unique combination algorithm allows our customers to combine flights from non-cooperating airlines onto a single itinerary, often resulting in significant savings.

800m flight combinations realtime priced per day | Aiming for EUR 1 billion revenues in 2017 | 172 TB of incoming data every day | 10 to 1000 employees in 3 years | 1 billion database updates/hour | 75 million searches per day | 6,000 bookings per day

If you are interested check out: https://www.kiwi.com/jobs/devs-tech/platform-engineer/

Don't hesitate to contact me directly (katerina.klepkova@kiwi.com)
